main event: On July 7, 1959, a report was made regarding a UFO sighting in Emmons, Minnesota, where a metal object was found and investigated.
interesting points: The object was evaluated as a magnesium anode after thorough investigation,The object was significantly corroded and did not show signs of disturbance where it was found,Lawrence J. Tacker addressed correspondence acknowledging the UFO report and the lack of photographic evidence,The sighting included an observer who saw a large metallic object hovering silently in a field,The investigation involved local authorities and multiple communications regarding the object's nature.
sighted object: metal object approximately 17 inches long and 5 inches in diameter, estimated to be magnesium alloy
witness description: Mr. X reported seeing a tall, narrow metallic object hovering silently.
